game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Recover the lost artifact of Eldoran
game.description: The ancient artifact of Eldoran has been stolen by the dark elves. Your mission is to venture into their territory and recover the artifact.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a special magic item

task.description: You must find a way to infiltrate the guarded tower of the dark elves.

task.objective: Recover the artifact from the elf sorceress at the tower top
task.description: The artifact is located at the top, guarded by her.

task.objective: Return the artifact to Eldareth in the temple
task.description: Escape the tower and deliver it to him at the temple.
